what: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior). CAPES (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior) database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: can install development version capesData GitHub :

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: Data collected CAPES/Brazil (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior) https://dadosabertos.capes.gov.br/dataset/, referring international mobility programs 2010 2019 funded Brazilian government. capesData package contains two datasets. also load tidyverse package pretty printing tibbles code examples. One called capesData, simplified version raw data; see ?capesData info: second dataset capesData_raw, contains variables original names downloaded; see ?capesData_raw info.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs
text: CAPES. (n.d.). “Coordenacao de Aperfeicoamento de Pessoal de Nivel Superior.” Retrieved July 07, 2024, https://dadosabertos.capes.gov.br/dataset/.

title: Summary
text: capesData R package [@rbase] provides interface accessing data scholarships international mobility programs funded Brazilian government CAPES (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior). package provides access information type scholarship program, start end dates scholarship, home institution, study institution, country study, program name, variables related financial aid received scholars. package provides information scholars period 2010 2019 contains two datasets. first dataset contains 14 variables 146,036 observations, second dataset 51 variables number observations. package automates common data reading organization steps allows researchers easily transparently track origin underlying data sources. designed enable users easily extend package’s features contribute shared data processing. source code package code version tracked hosted GitHub CRAN (Comprehensive R Archive Network).

title: Summary
text: Evaluations effects brain drain can conducted various perspectives using different statistical models. One challenges assessing international brain migration lack organized reliable databases long observation period. works @aref2019, @subbotin2021, @aykac2021, @kotsemir2022, @poitras2023 utilize bibliometric databases, SCOPUS Web Science, study academic impacts researchers’ migratory movements. @baruffaldi2020 used multiple data sources analyze effect international mobility scholarship research, including government data data collected candidates’ curricula, LinkedIn profiles, personal web pages. However, highlighted @subbotin2021, type database (bibliometric data) may limitations, causing random noise also systematic biases. alternative minimize errors work reliable databases use government statistics provided government agencies. national level, data international academic mobility researchers funded Brazilian government available download official sources Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES) [@capes] Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq) [@cnpq]. However, governmental agencies provide data related international academic mobility scholarships separated year /programs, generally way access data national scale. Sometimes gathered multiple databases, example, separated year, data comes various formats different names variables, requiring users verify standardize data can combined processed analysis. creates possibility errors programming mistakes, changes variable names, unexpected alterations data source. can lead misrepresentation data ways difficult identify, treating variable two different variables. Due issues, important develop robust tools provide clean, verified, standardized data multiple sources transparent manner. capesData package provides easy access clean data, ready analyze data Brazilian researchers government-funded scholarship programs international academic mobility, structure easy track raw data final set standardized data. Additional arguments package allow users, among options, easily manipulate visualize data directly R two datasets: one complete set raw data another summarized variables.  capesData package relies heavily popular packages many researchers familiar (dplyr [@dplyr], tidyr [@tidyr], others tidyverse [@tidyverse]), therefore, can easily adopted researchers working R. Currently, capesData provides data collected CAPES/Brazil Brazilian researchers international mobility scholarships 2010 2019. capesData package developed facilitate access, manipulation, analysis data CAPES database. CAPES key Brazilian government agency responsible evaluation support higher education programs. dataset contains valuable information researchers, policymakers, educational institutions.

title: Summary
text: R packages provide routines bibliometric data can used perform bibliometric data analyses can also utilized track researcher mobility based publications, bibliometrix bibliometrixData [@bibliometrix; @bibliometrixdata]. bibliometrix package provides various routines import bibliographic data SCOPUS, Clarivate Analytics’ Web Science, PubMed, Digital Science Dimensions, Cochrane databases, perform bibliometric analyses, create data matrices co-citation, coupling, scientific collaboration analysis, co-word analysis. bibliometrixData package includes example datasets extracted SCOPUS Clarivate Analytics’ Web Science. interfaces closely resemble purpose capesData package getLattes getLattesData packages [@getlattes; @getlattesdata]. packages provide information researchers registered curriculum database academics across country, 5 million records, known “Lattes” (http://lattes.cnpq.br/). academic life Brazilian researchers, related Brazilian universities, documented Lattes. information can obtained includes professional training, research area, publications, academic advisory roles, projects, etc. getLattes package allows working Lattes data exported XML format. getLattesData package set functions using access data. Therefore, using package requires manual download zip files XML data. CAPES central Brazilian government agency responsible overseeing evaluating quality graduate programs promoting scientific research advanced studies Brazil. CAPES maintains comprehensive database includes information faculty, students, courses, publications, institutional evaluations. database vital resource educational research, policy analysis, institutional reporting. capesData package provides comprehensive easy--use tool specifically designed address unique challenges working CAPES data. automating data access cleaning offering robust data manipulation visualization capabilities, capesData significantly enhances efficiency accessibility CAPES data analysis. package represents significant advancement empowering researchers, policymakers, educational institutions make data-driven decisions based reliable timely insights CAPES data.

title: Summary
text: Educational data analysis constantly evolving, increasing trends toward automation, integration, accessibility. future, field likely progress following directions: Data Integration: Improved integration educational research databases provide comprehensive view educational outcomes. Advanced Analytics: Incorporation advanced analytical techniques, including machine learning artificial intelligence, uncover deeper insights educational data. capesData package well-positioned adapt trends continue providing valuable tools capabilities users. staying cutting edge technology user needs, capesData aims contribute significantly advancement educational research policy analysis Brazil beyond.

what: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil. CAPES database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: data frame 146036 rows 14 columns: ID_PROCESSO Number concession process. NM_NIVEL Type scholarship. AN_INICIO Year scholarship begins. ME_INICIO Month scholarship begins. AN_FIM End year scholarship. ME_FIM End month scholarship. NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's home institution. NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM Name Federation State beneficiary's institution origin. NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's study institution. NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO Country destination beneficiary. NM_GRANDE_AREA Field knowledge. NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO Area knowledge classified CAPES. NM_AREA_AVALIACAO Area project evaluation. NM_PROGRAMA Program Name.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData
text: Created Leonardo Biazoli data provided CAPES/BRAZIL https://dadosabertos.capes.gov.br/dataset/.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
text: goal capesData provide attractive dataset exploring visualizing data International Mobility Programs funded CAPES/Brazil. CAPES database refers international mobility programs period 2010 2019.

title: Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
Data on Scholarships in CAPES International Mobility Programs — capesData_raw
text: data frame 146036 rows 51 columns: ID_PROCESSO Number concession process. NM_NIVEL Type scholarship. AN_INICIO Year scholarship begins. ME_INICIO Month scholarship begins. AN_FIM End year scholarship. ME_FIM End month scholarship. NM_IES_ORIGEM_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's home institution. NM_UF_IES_ORIGEM Name Federation State beneficiary's institution origin. NM_IES_ESTUDO_PRINCIPAL_DA Name beneficiary's study institution. NM_PAIS_IES_ESTUDO Country destination beneficiary. NM_GRANDE_AREA Field knowledge. NM_AREA_CONHECIMENTO Area knowledge classified CAPES. NM_AREA_AVALIACAO Area project evaluation. NM_PROGRAMA Program Name. CD_MOEDA Functional payment currency. VL_TOTAL_RECEBIDO_MOEDA Total amount received functional currency. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO Amount received travel assistance. VL_ADICIONAL_LOCALIDADE Amount received locality bonus. VL_ADICIONAL_DEPENDENTE Additional amount paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_BOLSA Amount received scholarship/fees. VL_TAXA_ESCOLAR Amount received tuition fees. VL_DIF_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO Amount received differences/reimbursements travel expenses performed. VL_DIF_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed health insurance. VL_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received health insurance. VL_TAXA_ESCOLAR_VALOR_P Amount received small tuition fees. VL_OUTROS_CREDITOS Amount received payment extraordinary expenses. VL_DIF_MENSALIDADE Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed tuition. VL_OUTROS_DEBITOS Amount received differences/refunds debts. VL_DIF_DEPENDENTES Amount received differences/reimbursements expenses performed additional dependent. VL_MENSALIDADE Amount received stipend. VL_AUX_INSTALACAO Amount received installation aid. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_ANUAL Amount received annual installments health insurance. VL_MENSALIDADES_AGENDADAS Amount received scheduled tuition. VL_REEMBOLSO_TAXA_ESCOLAR Amount received refund tuition fees paid beneficiary. VL_AUX_MORADIA Amount received housing allowance. VL_DIF_AUX_INSTALACAO Amount received differences/refunds installation aid. VL_REEMBOLSO_PASSAGEM_AEREA Amount received differences/refunds airfare. VL_AUX_MATERIAL_DIDATICO Amount received aid teaching materials, paid Ciencia Sem Fronteiras Program. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE Amount received health insurance benefit. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO_CAPES_SETEC Amount received subsistence allowance, paid CAPES/SETEC program. VL_MENSALIDADE_DEMANDA Amount received monthly fee demand. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_DEMANDA Amount received travel allowance demand. VL_MENSALIDADE_LIC_MATERNIDADE Amount received tuition maternity leave scholarship holder duration process. VL_ESCOLA_ALTOS_ESTUDOS Amount received scholarship Escola de Altos Estudos program. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO Amount received subsistence allowance. VL_AUX_INSTALACAO_DEPENDENTE Additional amount received installation aid, paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_DEPENDENTE Additional amount received health insurance aid, paid full doctoral scholarship holders registered dependents. VL_AJUDA_CUSTO_MTUR Amount received subsistence allowance, paid CAPES/MTUR program. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_RETORNO_D Amount received travel allowance return. VL_AUX_SEGURO_SAUDE_DEMANDA Amount received health insurance demand. VL_AUX_DESLOCAMENTO_PESQUISA Amount received travel allowance research.
